title: Nikita Khrushchev in Disneyland
subtitle: :: Rumours: Soviet Prime Minister Nikita Khrushchev was prevented from visiting Disneyland during an official visit to the United States in 1959.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Soviet Prime Minister Nikita Khrushchev was prevented from visiting Disneyland during an official visit to the United States in 1959.
